title: For 2-wheeler vehicles, minimum 25% of the total number of required parking for 4-wheelers, shall be provided
clause_text: For 2-wheeler vehicles, minimum 25% of the total number of required parking for 4-wheelers, shall be provided. Taxi Stand for minimum 25 taxis and 50 Auto Rikshaws. Bus Terminal for minimum 10 buses shall be provided. For the area of Support Services, parking shall be provided as per Regulation 44. The additional parking space may be granted without counting the such area of parking into F.S.I.
section: General Requirements for Exhibition / Convention Halls shall be as under:

source_pdf.text_snippet: For 2-wheeler vehicles, minimum 25% of the total number of required parking for 4-wheelers, shall be provided.
